abstract: Alibaba’s Jack Ma thinks the recession is going to last a long time. But he says Chinese factories can help American entrepreneurs.
snippet: Alibaba’s Jack Ma thinks the recession is going to last a long time. But he says Chinese factories can help American entrepreneurs.
lead_paragraph: Jack Ma, the chief executive of Alibaba Group, stopped by to talk about his plans for Alibaba.com, the Chinese Web site for making business-to-business connections, and Taobao.com, the Chinese answer to eBay.

headline.main: When Will the Good Times Return?
